Functions.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSearch13.name: getStreamData(url:credentials:app:type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Functions.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSearch13.abstract: Get streaming updates to a document with the specified id

Functions.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSearch03.name: getSearchStreamData(url:credentials:app:type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Functions.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSearch03.abstract: Get streaming updates to a search query provided in the request body

Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: init(data:httpResponse:error:)
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Initialises the Response class by providing the parameters as received response from the server

Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: getReceivedData()
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Returns the data that is received from the server

Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: getStatusCode()
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Returns the status code of the made request

Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: getReceivedError()
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Returns the received error if any from the server

Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: isErrorEncountered()
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Checks if any error is encountered from the server for the request made based on the status code

Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.name: getReceivedStatusFromCode()
Classes/Response.html#/s:18SwiftElasticS.abstract: Returns the status of the request made from the status code

Classes/Request.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSe.name: init(credentials:)
Classes/Request.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSe.abstract: Inititate parameters of a request that needs to be made

Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: isSuccess()
Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Test whether a status code represents success

Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: isClientError()
Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Test whether a status code represents a client error

Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: isServerError()
Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Test whether a status code represents a server error

Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: isBadCredential()
Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Test whether a status code represents bad credential

Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: isNotFound()
Classes/Errors.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Test whether a status code represents page doesn’t exist

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: index(type:id:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Adds a JSON document to the search index (via POST/PUT request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: get(type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Fetches a specified document from the search index (GET request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: delete(type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Deletes a specified document from the search index (DELETE request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: update(type:id:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Partially update a specified document in the search index. (POST request)

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: bulk(type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Make bulk requests on the search index. Bulk requests can be any of index, update and delete requests.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: search(type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Search across documents in the index. The request body is constructed using the Query DSL.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: msearch(type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Combine multiple search requests into a single request. The individual request bodies are constructed using the Query DSL.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: getStream(type:id:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Get streaming updates to a document with a specified id. The [stream = true] parameter informs the appbase.io service to keep the connection open, which is used to receive subsequent updates.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: searchStream(type:body:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Get streaming updates to a search query provided in the request body. The [stream=true] parameter informs the appbase.io service to keep the connection open, which is used to receive subsequent updates.

Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.name: getMapping(type:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:18SwiftElasticSea.abstract: Get the data mapping for the search index

Classes/Errors.html.name: Errors
Classes/Errors.html.abstract: Class for handling different types of errors

Classes/Request.html.name: Request
Classes/Request.html.abstract: Class to handle the GET, POST PUT and DELETE requests made from any class inside the library

Classes/Response.html.name: Response
Classes/Response.html.abstract: This class handles the responses that are received from the server when any request is made. It also handles any error while receiving the response.
